hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our customer care services, policies, and support options.

faqs.question: What are your customer service hours?
faqs.answer: Our customer service team is available 24/7, 365 days a year. You can reach us through phone, email, live chat, or our mobile app at any time. We also offer multilingual support in over 15 languages to better serve our global customer base.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us through multiple channels: Phone (toll-free), Email support, Live chat on our website, Mobile app chat, Social media channels, and our comprehensive help center with detailed guides and tutorials.

faqs.question: What types of issues can you help me with?
faqs.answer: Our support team can assist with account management, product inquiries, technical troubleshooting, order status, returns and exchanges, billing questions, and general product guidance. We're trained to handle a wide range of customer needs efficiently.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
faqs.answer: Response times vary by channel: Live chat and phone support provide immediate assistance, email responses typically within 2-4 hours during business hours, and social media inquiries are addressed within 24 hours. For urgent matters, we recommend using live chat or phone support.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, bank transfers, digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and for business customers, we offer invoice billing with net payment terms. All transactions are processed securely through encrypted payment gateways.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund for my purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for most products. Digital products have a 7-day refund policy. To request a refund, contact our customer service team with your order number. Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after approval.

faqs.question: What are the system requirements for your products?
faqs.answer: Our products are compatible with Windows 10/11, macOS 10.15+, iOS 14+, and Android 8.0+. For web-based services, we support all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Specific hardware requirements vary by product and are detailed in each product's technical specifications.

faqs.question: Do you offer technical support for setup and installation?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive technical support including guided setup, installation assistance, configuration help, and troubleshooting. Our technical team can assist via remote desktop support, phone guidance, or detailed step-by-step documentation. Enterprise customers receive dedicated technical account management.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. We use industry-standard encryption (SSL/TLS), comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations, conduct regular security audits, and never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent. Our privacy policy details all security measures.

faqs.question: Can I speak to a manager if I'm not satisfied?
faqs.answer: Of course! If you're not satisfied with the initial resolution, you can request to speak with a supervisor or manager. We also have an escalation process for complex issues and a dedicated customer satisfaction team that follows up on all escalated cases to ensure complete resolution.
